name: Football Star League
description:
Play the brand new football game Football Star League and enjoy the insanely real, ultra-fast and immersive football experience!

The new Football Star League very easy to learn game controls allows you to jump-start the fun. Just flick your finger across the screen to kick the ball and score a goal! As you progress through the game, shots become more challenging and you’ll need a solid strategy to bend shots and split defences. Be the hero in every match.

Download Football Star League from the App Store now!
